about_the_game:
✦✦ Why should you play this? ✦✦
Create your own ragdolls wars in your own city in Sandbox Mode, play with guns, melee weapons, crazy vehicles and so much more. Simply enjoy everything you love about ragdolls!

✦✦ What can you expect from this game? ✦✦
✦ Sandbox: Build your own cities for your ragdolls
✦ Play pre-built cities without having to create from scratch.
✦ Play Mini-Games.
✦ Save your cities and let your friends play it too.
✦ Countless weapons and items for the fight.
✦ Great Melee Combat Behavior & Animations.
✦ Collect, Drop and Destroy items you liked
✦ Good Melee, Shooter AI included.
✦ Stamina Combat Based System. Potions to recovery health or stamina.
✦ Customization: Change the look of your ragdoll from an assortment of skins and faces that you can unlock as you progress through the game!
✦ And so much more…

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 605
  • Sound Card: Any

name: CITY OF RAGDOLLS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 605
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Create your own ragdolls wars in your own city in Sandbox Mode, play with guns, melee weapons, crazy vehicles and so much more. Simply enjoy everything you love about ragdolls!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Vietnamese, Ukrainian
